Text: IMPORTANT NOTE - Thanks to Listless Ink, someone has confirmed a way to get Sono Hanabira running on Mac OS X.  Read here: http://the.markinglifestyle.com/project/sonohana-mac/

Another update!  Marking has recently released some experimental scripts for Mac/Linux users to allo them easier installation of the games.  Please try them out, and if you have any feedback, please comment.

See here: http://listlessink.wordpress.com/sono-hanabira-ni-kuchizuke-wo-series/comment-page-5/#comment-83854
thanks bro. I've wanted to play the rest of these after my friend gave me the 3rd one. cheers
Got 1-8 working great with English patches. Looks like the rest dont have patches yet so will wait. Great upload, will seed
